text:
…で伝染ったら
って聞いて
きたのよ！

font-size: 14px;color: #59141C;background-color: #EFA5B9;left: 397px;top: 233px;width: 45px; height: 22px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 20%;

text: 私達は病原菌かっつーの！
style: font-size: 14px;color: #222B4C;background-color: #DBA8CC;left: 487px;top: 177px;width: 141px; height: 55px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 30%;

text:
あいつら
本当に嫌な奴ね!!
